en.description: Lua Lenses convert 3.25% of excess Affinity into Focus points, ~44% more than the Eidolon Focus Lens, ~86% more than the Greater Focus Lens, and 160% more than the regular Focus Lens. Their blueprint can be acquired as a Tier C Lua Disruption reward.

ru.description: Луа линза конвертирует 3.25% от полученного синтеза в очки фокуса.

ko.description: Lua Lenses convert 3.25% of excess Affinity into Focus points, ~44% more than the Eidolon Focus Lens, ~86% more than the Greater Focus Lens, and 160% more than the regular Focus Lens. Their blueprint can be acquired as a Tier C Lua Disruption reward.
